Name: Stable Stance
Action: Add 2 to 1 physical attack roll each turn

Name: Concentration
Action: Add 2 to 1 magic attack roll each turn

Name: Reckless Attack
Action: Deal double damage, and suffer double damage

Name: Explosive Magic
Action: Magic attacks deal half damage to all adjacent

Name: Precision Strike
Action: Add 1 damage to all physical attacks

Name: Rapier
Action: Deal 1 damage. Add 2 to 1 attack roll

Name: Shield
Action: Spend at any time to add 2 to AC
